# FrameControl.DisposeOperation property

The type of frame area disposal to be done after rendering this frame; in other words, it specifies how the output buffer should be changed at the end of the delay (before rendering the next frame).

```csharp
public FrameAreaDisposal DisposeOperation { get; set; }
```
